Name

ppl show - Display a contact’s full details

Synopsis

ppl show <contact>

Description

Display the full details of the specified <contact>. This command will output all the contact details that are currently stored, including email address, date of birth, organization, and so on.

Examples

$ ppl show jdoe
jdoe: John Doe <jdoe@example.org>

    Birthday  1970-01-01

Phone Numbers:
  0123456789
  0543216790
